TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDispatchMessageFormatter

Docs.summary: Defines methods that deserialize request messages and serialize response messages in a service application.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Implement the IDispatchMessageFormatter interface to create a formatter extension that controls the serialization of parameters into a message and the deserialization from a message into parameters in a service application. To insert the custom formatter into the service application, assign the IDispatchMessageFormatter object to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation.Formatter%2A> property using a behavior.
## Examples For a complete example, see [Operation Formatter and Operation Selector](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void DeserializeRequest (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message, object[] parameters);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DeserializeRequest(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message, object[] parameters) cil managed

Docs.param: The objects that are passed to the operation as parameters.
Docs.summary: Deserializes a message into an array of parameters.

remarks.format: ## Examples For a complete example, see [Operation Formatter and Operation Selector](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message SerializeReply (System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion messageVersion, object[] parameters, object result);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message SerializeReply(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion messageVersion, object[] parameters, object result) cil managed

Docs.summary: Serializes a reply message from a specified message version, array of parameters, and a return value.

remarks.format: ## Examples For a complete example, see [Operation Formatter and Operation Selector](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
